def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    last_digit = sequence[-1]
    middle_digits = sequence[1:-1].replace(first_digit, "0")
    transformed_sequence = first_digit + middle_digits + last_digit
    return transformed_sequence
```

```python
def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    last_digit = sequence[-1]
    middle_digits = sequence[1:-1].replace(first_digit, "0")
    transformed_sequence = first_digit + middle_digits + last_digit
    return transformed_sequence
```
